your baby knows you based on smell most acutely and sound this has been demonstrated many times over in various neonatal experiments that have been conducted this however does not address your own best wishes with your new lo it wild ride my first child was very independent baby and never acted like she needed me specifically we were even able to go on week long trip when she was months old and month later she started crawling and she wander off during library storytime and then come back to me so finally it was obvious she at least knew we belonged together and as the months wore on it was moms with my two sons it was even question lol he will absolutely know don worry about it they won be there forever enjoy the help while you have it your baby knows your voice and your smell your baby will know you re his mother but think it also so important you are getting to know your baby learning how to soothe which cry means hungry vs soiled diaper what holds his attention etc once your mil leaves you will need to be very well acquainted with your baby to care for him it great you re getting rest but you also need to make sure you re learning all your babys cues likes dislikes and what is normal vs what is irregular the newborn stage is over in flash the days are long but omg the months are so short want to second the recognition via smell and sound you sound very thoughtful to think of someone else bonding time with your baby make sure your baby snuggles quota is where you feel comfortable long term it can help recognizing your baby cues for hunger fatigue etc my first son was really chill baby and did seem to prefer anyone in particular he was happy in anyone arms when went back to work when he was 3mos old he had full time nanny and would care when left or came home for long long time hahaha but even during the baby phase when he would cry the only people that were able to comfort him quickly were me my husband or the nanny they know who you are then when he was toddler he went through mommy only phase now he prefers daddy and chopped liver he yo for reference my daughter had stranger anxiety since she was weeks old she gets upset even when strangers look at her she would even cry when my husband would look at her forget about anyone holding her except me it was such sharp contrast from my son luckily she warmed up to our current nanny went back to work when she was months old she tolerates her dad but still is fond of anyone else haha bottom line is they def know who you are some babies are more chill than others and they definitely go through phases of who they prefer amp x200b he knows noticed that my son also really likes grandma type ladies he loves cuddling with my mil and one of the directors at daycare as well don be worried when you see your son wanting grandma cuddles when he bit older—he doesn prefer her over you it simply that mom is always there so it may seem like he doesn ask for you as much it almost like he takes it for granted that you will always magically appear for him without him even asking my son is like this with me whenever someone else gets home like his dad he runs straight to them and left in the dust but am always with him when did start leaving him with his dad by themselves so could go to bookclub husband would send me videos of lil guy calling mama mama mum mum trying different variations to make me appear so he knows you re his mama he just so comfortable with you and so secure in the knowledge of you always being present and available to him that he doesn really understand you as separate entity from himself yet months in amp saying this now have similar story with my emergency section except my husband was able to hold her almost right away they kept trying to give her to me but could physically do it for shaking and then later we realized was not given further pain meds so it was several hours before was able to hold her she has been mommy girl ever since was put under general anaesthetic for my ec and spent couple of hours in the recovery ward after waking from the procedure as my blood pressure was still really high turns out had preeclampsia my son was born at 30pm but did meet him until almost 1am when they finally wheeled me into my room was so worried we missed critical window for proper skin on skin bonding time but he 4mths now and it clear he knows who am although he still has days where dad doing exactly as have been doing will seemingly calm him without issue 🤷‍♀️ your baby knows you by your smell and your voice he will always seek you out and you will always be his others may be source of comfort but he knows your heartbeat and voice more intimately than anyone else his time with your mil or anyone else is him just accepting that he ca be with burp him just tell your mom you need more time and don take no for an answer it great that she is here and helping wish had help but it your kid think if you don stand up for yourself you will look and eating her toys lucky if she ll let me cuddle her for 10 minutes each wake time in my 8th month and this also got me their bonding is sweet and important but your bonding is far more important think it sweet that you are allowing her that time don think would have been able to allow that but if you don feel like you re getting enough time then that trumps grandma every day and she should that it absolutely did not my son is my world and am his clear favorite person even after being in daycare from the age of weeks and even after overnights with mil he watching his half hour of evening cartoons on my lap as type this am his favorite chair lol can also say that my mil was an absolute lifesaver during that time we did always get along perfectly but she became very dear to me for being such great help and wonderful grandparent meanwhile my mom was apparently just being frankly bitch she was just jealous although strangely she does not seem interested in helping at all when she is around which is rare my mil literally saved our sanity and helped us be better parents she let us get sleep so please do not worry for second or feel guilty about getting help little or lot of help left your baby knows you you re also giving wonderful gift to your mil and her grandchild they are forming bond too which as your kiddo gets older you ll see even more and more my oldest has great respect your boundaries then just relax and enjoy the help while you ve got it and congratulations on your little one this is my biggest fear going back to work aww teared up my daughter also knew my voice she was calm when we did skin to skin but when they cleaned her up and my husband held her she cried but talked to her and she calmed right down if she going to be with you guys for few more months would encourage you to take this as time to work on accepting that you do owe anyone else thing when it comes to your child used to feel bad about not letting my new mother in law have my daughter for hours at time since it her first grandchild however the privilege of being grandparent are different than that of parent you do owe her any explanation other than oh need some mommy time with little one then gently take baby and enjoy him if you start to feel bad remember that you do need to deprive yourself so that someone else can indulge absolutely positively without any doubt your baby knows you are his mom if his needs are getting met and he is safe loved and cared for however that happens just mom other close caregivers he is going to thrive rested stress reduced mom is great thing for baby having someone around who will help care for him give him snuggles help keep the house functioning so you can get rest is ideal in many ways more people giving love great for baby baby development right now is about being safe cared for and developing attachments more people with whom to attach does not equal less attachment to each just the opposite more people giving consistent love and care equals stronger attachment bonds he is your baby and as such you get to snuggle him whenever you want do be afraid to assert gently your turn whenever you want just walk up and hold out
